creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 23630
Proposal patch to improve graphic of load monitor

The current image for load status in Monitor Results aren't best view with grayscale.
This patch to improve graphic of load status with some colors, and no display color when server is dead.

creator: milamber@apache.org
